name: Combat Troopers 2
description:
Station LV-427's reactor has gone dark, you and your drone companion are sent to investigate the cause. Fend off hordes of bugs with our fluid control system! Collect power ups to experience different gameplay styles and earn credits in order to purchase equipment from the shops that are scattered throughout the levels. Use the help button to draw a line to your objective if you are feeling lost but don't forget to explore as there may be power ups hidden around every corner!

* Sci Fi theme
* Varied power ups
* Hordes of alien bugs
* Solid shooter mechanics
* Your very own helper drone
* High quality 3D environments
* Starship Troopers inspired universe
